title: kled price change
body:
Is anyone else really pissed at the fact that the kled bundle was 1837 and now it's being sold for 1462?

i had RP saved to buy him and i had to buy more, and after i did i purchased the bundle and after playing a few games i noticed that the price had been lowered to 1462. 
I am not a person with a lot of money and buying the extra RP is something that i can't be doing and after the price change i would have been able to afford him without buying extra RP.

If anyone else is outraged about this upvote so we can be heard.

replies.body: As *Praetor Don* mentioned, we initially launched Kled's bundle and skin at the wrong price. We've gone ahead and issues RP refunds for the differences, but please let me know if you haven't received this refund yet.

It was priced incorrectly when it first came out, it has since been adjusted and you should have been refunded RP if you bought it at the higher price. If not, I'd make a support ticket :D
